pages_home_welcomeText: To see who is the master of time management!
pages_game_error_name_format: The name cannot have special symbols
pages_game_error_name_length: The length of the name must be less than 20
component_gameInstruction_desc1: Your name will be registered in the record statistics. If you jump out of the game, the result will not be calculated.
component_gameInstruction_desc2: Click "Pause" button or press Shift + S on the keyboard to pause the timing.
component_gameInstruction_desc3: Click "Resume" button or press Shift + S on the keyboard again to resume the timing.
component_gameInstruction_desc4: Click "Now!" button or press Space on the keyboardï¼Œthe timer will end and the score will be calculated.
component_gameInstruction_desc5: Show off your good score to your friends!
